items.text: pushed down the ground to long-on. <b>Fifty for Tamim

items.preText: SakibM: "Tamim Iqbal's TRANSFORMATION over the years, over the course of his career, was so conspicuous. The tremendous development and change in his batting style, mentality, judgement and all other factors as he grew up as a top-class batsman have helped him to come this far. I hope youngsters like Sabbir or Anamul to be this much ready to accept a change, to transform themselves just like Tamim did! "
items.text: yorker, squeezed back to the bowler

items.preText: Sriram Srinivas: "What is the point of keeping Bishoo away? leggie into the left handers can tempt a wicket too" Here he comes.
